title: Sorting by Functions
description: This lab aims to test your ability to sort a collection by something other than its natural order. In this case, we will sort strings by their length instead of alphabetically.

meta.title: Sorting by Functions in Go
meta.description: Learn how to sort a collection of strings by their length instead of alphabetically in Go.
meta.keywords: custom sort, go, go labs, functions, go playground online, sorting, string length, go lab, go practice

verify.name: Verify Sorting By String Length In Go Program
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
